name: iBooBox - for iPad mini
description:
ALL NEW DESIGN IS HERE! Each Case is Handmade to Order. Ships in 2-3 weeks. Available with or without Apple Smart Cover compatibility. All sensors, controls, and connectors are accessible, some even enhanced! Size Length 7.875 in. Width 5.5 in. Depth .52 in.
What Makes iBooBox Different:
2-Piece Ergonomic Design with Unibody Construction for Comfort and Strength. Precision Machined from Solid Bamboo with Cross-Grain Splined Ends and Pegged Corners for Incredible Durability. iBooKam - Camera Lens Mounting Threads magBOO- Magnetic Quick Mounting System tunedBOO - Passive Sound Amplification & Redirection stickyBOO - Attaches using No-Residue Reusable 3M Adhesives indestructiBOO - Optional Carbon Fiber or Fiber Glass Reinforcing Layer More Details About iBooBox for iPad mini can be found here
Unique, Eco-friendly, and Biodegradable Made from rapidly renewable FSC certified bamboo.
Made by a Machine in a Sweaty Shop. Finished by Hand on a Florida Beach.
International Shipping Available

Please be sure to add both a device option and a bamboo color option to your cart. Otherwise you will receive a standard Carbonized color.

name: mag-Boo Universal Mounts
description: This slim unobtrusive mag-Boo Universal Mount can turn almost any surface into a strong magnetic mounting point for your iBooBox equipped iPhone. Hidden inside of this tiny piece of bamboo is a super strong magnet with over 10lbs. of pull force. This magnet along with the magnet hidden in the iBooBox case creates a place to quickly and securely keep your phone in view while your hands are busy elsewhere. Use in the car, next to the sink, on a mirror, or create a bed side charging station. The possibilities are endless. Mounts to any clean fairly flat surface using 3M mounting tape. Also holds lightning cable end magnetically for clutter free organization. Comes standard with black rubber o-ring to keep iPhone from rotating, glow in the dark o-ring also available. Larger version of this mount coming soon for iBooBox for iPad and iPad mini. mag-Boo mounting accessories allow users to mount their iDevice just about anywhere one can imagine. They provide a strong sturdy mounting point, yet have a simple and unobtrusive clutter free design. Magnets integrated into the bamboo allow the iDevice to magnetically adhere to things like refrigerators, cars, or any ferrous metal items. Compatible mag-Boo mounts designed by PEACHii will be available to provide a number of mounting solutions like a desktop stand for the iPad or a car dash mount for clutter free navigation with the iPhone. Currently available a Tripod Mount for the iPhone that doubles as a kickstand and a Universal Mount to create a mounting point for your phone on any flat clean surface. More mounts will be made available soon.

options.name: ADD Glow In The Dark O-Ring

name: mag-Boo Tripod/Kickstand Mounts
description: This mag-Boo Tripod/Kickstand Mount will allow users to attach their iBooBox equipped iPhone to any tripod. A 1/4-20 steel nut embedded into the base of the mount provides a sturdy attachment point for anything with the proper threads, not just tripods. It also doubles as a kickstand allowing the phone to rest in a number of natural viewing angles. mag-Boo mounting accessories allow users to mount their iDevice just about anywhere one can imagine. They provide a strong sturdy mounting point, yet have a simple and unobtrusive clutter free design. Magnets integrated into the bamboo allow the iDevice to magnetically adhere to things like refrigerators, cars, or any ferrous metal items. Compatible mag-Boo mounts designed by PEACHii will be available to provide a number of mounting solutions like a desktop stand for the iPad or a car dash mount for clutter free navigation with the iPhone. Currently available a Tripod Mount for the iPhone that doubles as a kickstand and a Universal Mount to create a mounting point for your phone on any flat clean surface. More mounts will be made available soon.

name: Wrist Straps & Lanyards
description:
Wrist Straps & Neck Lanyards

Here you can find wrist straps and lanyards handmade by PEACHii. Made with high strength round para cord and quick release ends.

name: Customize Your PEACHii
description:
Customize your PEACHii
For as little a $5. Add any of the options below to your PEACHii case purchase to give your case an even more unique look! More pictures coming soon. Options: Plain $5
- Get your iBooBak or iKarbonBak all natural. No logos just beautifully plain bamboo or carbon fiber! Your Name $10
- Have your name engraved on your PEACHii. On our cases it will be located in between the two set of lanyard holes. Special placement may be possible, contact us here for custom orders. On the iBooBak and iKarbonBak it will replace the PEACHii name. Up to 10 letters only. Graphic
Engraved with Endmill
$20 - Bak's and iPhone cases
$40 - iPad cases
- Send us your custom graphics and we will engrave it with an end mill. Using the end mill for engraving doesn't allow for the same intricate detail that the laser offers. But it doesn't burn and discolor the bamboo. The engraving is left with natural colors, providing a more ghosted graphic look. HD Graphic
Engraved with Laser
$30 - iBooBak and iPhone cases
$50 - iPad cases
- Send us your custom graphics and we will engrave it with a laser. The laser allows for much higher detail to be engraved (burned) into your Boo. Very intricate graphics can be placed on the Boo due to the laser being thinner than a human hair.
(Not Available on iKarbonBak) No Trademarked Graphics. Unless of course you own it, and can prove it!
Custom Orders are Non-Refundable

name: Camera Lenses & Accessories
description:
Camera Lenses & Accessories

Here you can find all the lenses and accessories that are recommended by PEACHii for use with our cases for iPhone and iPad.

name: iKarbonBak - with Black or White Bezel
description:
iKarbonBak - [i-carbon-back] Carbon Fiber iPhone 4/4S Battery Cover Unbreakable Carbon Fiber 8.8g Lighter and .010 in. Thinner Than Original Battery Cover
  • Customize your iKarbonBak

  • Install Guide Click Here

    • Ships in 1-2 weeks This is not a skin or veneer that adds thickness to your preciously thin iPhone 4/4S. This is a complete replacement part for the iPhone 4 rear glass battery cover. We use real carbon fiber rigid panels to make a replacement for the original glass in the battery cover assembly. The CF panels we use are only 1/32 of an inch thick, which is about .010 in. thinner than the original glass panel, and can't be broken from a drop or much else. The iKarbonBak weighs only 13.4g, that is only slightly more than half the 22.2g of the original glass assembly. The iKarbonBak specs match the OEM battery cover size otherwise, making it compatible with most protective bumpers and cases. Of course we recommend using a PEACHii bamboo case which is designed to compliment the iKarbonBak. We designed our product with this goal in mind. Allow owners to customize the iPhone 4/4S look and feel, while still allowing them to place the phone into an official bumper case or any other case for that matter. We chose carbon fiber for it's beauty and strength. Carbon fiber is similar to steel in strength, yet super light weight. It is not a conductor of heat and will not absorb moisture. It causes minimal interfere with signal strength, but this may be more noticeable in low signal strength areas. The carbon fiber is precision machined to the same specs as the original glass part. We sourced the highest quality OEM parts available for the frame and camera lens/housing. We assemble these parts into a unique piece of art. No flash diffuser is used in our product, only a small piece of clear high strength polycarbonate. This provides a more intense flash. iKarbonBak is compatible with all iPhone 4 & 4S models. By following these simple instructions, you can swap yours in minutes. 2 Screwdrivers included (Phillips & Pentalobe 5-point).

    Installing iPhone 4 Rear Panel

name: iBooBak - with Black Bezel
description:
iBooBak - [i-boo-back] Bamboo iPhone 4/4S Battery Cover Black Bezel
  • Customize your iBooBak
  • iBooBak Install Guide Click Here

    • 3 Bamboo Color Options Available:
    Ships in 1-2 weeks
    This is not a skin or veneer that adds thickness to your preciously thin iPhone 4/4S. This is a complete replacement part for the iPhone rear glass battery cover. The iBooBak specs match the OEM battery cover size wise, making it compatible with most protective bumpers and cases. Of course we recommend using PEACHii bamboo case which is designed to compliment the iBooBak. We designed our product with this goal in mind. Allow owners to customize the iPhone look and feel, while still allowing them to place the phone into an official bumper case or any other case for that matter. We chose bamboo for it's beauty and earth friendly qualities. Bamboo is harder and more durable than traditional hardwood. It is not a conductor of heat and will not absorb moisture. Also it does not interfere with signal strength, we have actually noticed a 1dbm gain during testing. The bamboo is precision machined to the same specs as the original glass part. We sourced the highest quality OEM parts available for the frame and camera lens/housing. We assemble these parts into a unique piece of art. No flash diffuser is used in our product, only a small piece of high strength polycarbonate. This provides a more intense flash. We finish the iBooBak by coating it with a durable urethane. Leaving a very natural feel and rich looking finish, while offering protection from liquids and cracking. Colors and patterns in the bamboo will vary. iBooBak is compatible with all iPhone 4 & 4S models. By following these simple instructions, you can swap yours in minutes. 2 Screwdrivers included (Phillips & Pentalobe 5-point).

    Installing iPhone 4 Rear Panel


    www.flickr.com
    PEACHii's iBooBak photoset
